attributes.review: This is the WORST app I’ve ever downloaded. As soon as i got it it started to glitch and was ridiculously slow. After that I got a few virus warnings and my phone started to glitch after.
attributes.title: Don’t even download

attributes.review: This app spreads false information and does so by lying about literally everything. I can’t believe anyone supports this horrible app. It spams with unnecessary notifications and doesn’t run properly half of the time. Very disappointed mr orange man
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: My daughter tried playing this game and it told her she is to young?!? Plus my dog died after looking at the weird looking characters face!! I DEMAND A REFUND even if this app doesn’t cost money i want money for the medical bills. My toaster even stopped working this app is pure BAD LUCK!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE AND HORRIFYING

attributes.title: APPS IS TRASH

attributes.review: One day I was using the app then my toilet fell from my ceiling into my lap crushing my phone and breaking my legs. Now I’m paralyzed in a wheelchair and sometimes I still remember the sound of my ceiling being down apart by my toilet. I swear it was because of the app.
attributes.title: AWFUL APP

attributes.review: I got this app and it IMMEDIATELY crashed when I went to open it. completely disappointed and outraged right now >:( how else am i supposed to get updates on the Number one family in America?? one star not cool :(
attributes.title: CRASHING?????

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app I throw up. He has my phone number now so I have to change that and get a new phone. Worst service ever even Burger King has better customer service. I don’t even like trump. 0/0 would not recommend.
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING

attributes.review: This app is so bad. It crashed my phone and punched my nana in the face! My poor Catholic nana didn’t deserve this!! And yet Trump’s app has punched her in the face. And it told her god doesn’t exist. So now I have to deal with that. Oh and there’s nazis!! We don’t like that.
attributes.title: Never download this app

attributes.review: When I got this app and I got home from McDonald’s McDonald’s disappeared and my chicken nuggets and fries that were in the microwave for gone even my microwave disappeared my children disappeared and my whole entire house was gone I hate this app😡
attributes.title: The worst

attributes.review: when i first opened this app it was  terrifying i look to the corner of my room and i see such a  frightening petrified scare in the corner of my room and you know what it was it was him the monster who’s been living up in this country he was orange with blonde hair and when i tell you i was terrified i was terrified. so this is why i don’t recommend downloading it and it lags so much and takes up half of my storage and for what. 👩🏻‍🦲😻
attributes.title: this is such a bad app
